documents.document: #Kingsway, #Broadway, #4th, #7th, #Cambie, #12th -- only streets I was on today, but I give big kudos to @CityofVancouver for clearing them!
Kudos to the @CityofVancouver for clearing the main streets and keeping on top of it all weekend. Praise to @MayorGregor and City staff!
Kudos to @bchydro for restoring our power so quickly last night. Thank you from East Van / Burnaby border near Kingsway.
ICYMI last night @CityofVanouver is now playing catchup coz it failed to prep last night! #Vancouversnow… https://t.co/2LsIRY241i
How can we be world class city that comes to a standstill with just a few centimetres of #snow?!?!? #vanpoli #Vancouver #Vancouversnow 4/4
Is there a disconnect somewhere in the @CityofVancouver that needs to be fixed? Really, what IS the problem? 3/4
Is the @VanMayorsOffice / @MayorGregor aware of what is really going on, especially in #EastVan? You can't even drive down Kingsway! 2/4
This is ridiculous! We knew this snow was coming for days. Is someone in the @CityofVancouver Streets Dept. sabotaging @MayorGregor? 1/4
@VanMayorsOffice You're kidding, right? I guess Kingsway is not considered a major route.
@originaljoes we talked to 2 waitresses, but got no results. They were equally frustrated. I'll reach out to Joe Palmer today.
Dear @originaljoes Cambie, we want to stay for another drink but music you are blasting is horrible! Table beside us left for same reason.
2 weeks ago @CityofVancouver did amazing job preparing the roads for morning commuters.They failed in planning & preparation this time today
Horrible! Warning: violence within. https://t.co/U4rS0oXRKy

Dear @Canucks , we've always loved you. Now you're rewarding our #love. Thank you #Canucks! #hockey #WeAreAllCanucks @NHL #Vancouver
Awww. @LackWille We still love @eddielack in #Vancouver. But we really love #victory, too! We even let him have the lead at the beginning.
Wow @Canucks! Two OT victories early in the season! #Vancouver #NHL @NHL #hockey. Sorry @eddielack ! Thanks @j_markstrom! #WeAreAllCanucks
Dear @eddielack, We love you in #Vancouver so we gave you a bit of a lead. Now it's time to claim a victory on home ice.

Wooooo! Way to go @Canucks ! Thank you Daniel! #Canucks #NHL #hockey #GoCanucksGo!
You can't be serious?!?!?! WTF #Canucks??? The @NHL rarely sees such idiocy! Goddess/God help us this season! #StillALoyalFan #GoCanucks#Go!
